titles: The French Lucian made English; By J.D. Esq
Nouveaux dialogues des morts. Part 1. English.
author: Fontenelle, M. de (Bernard Le Bovier), 1657-1757.
Dryden, John, 1631-1700, attibuted name.
Davies, John, 1625-1693, attributed name.
publisher: printed for R. Bentley, at the Post-House in Russel-street, in Covent-Garden,
notes: A translation, variously attributed to John Dryden and to John Davies, of the first part of:  Fontenelle.  Nouveaux dialogues des morts.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
